meanings.definition: A person who tells jokes or plays pranks.
meanings.sent1: The jokers at the party had everyone laughing with their funny stories.
meanings.sent2: The comedian was known for being one of the best jokers in town.
meanings.sent3: The jokers in the office always kept the mood light with their humor.
meanings.sent4: She was the joker of the group, always ready with a witty remark.
meanings.sent5: The jokers in the circus made the audience burst into laughter with their antics.

meanings.definition: Playing cards, usually with a picture of a jester, that can be used as wild cards in some games.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the player drew two jokers and was thrilled to have wild cards.
meanings.sent2: The deck of cards included two jokers for added excitement during play.
meanings.sent3: The jokers in the deck made the card game more unpredictable and fun.
meanings.sent4: Having the jokers in the deck was like having a secret weapon up your sleeve.
meanings.sent5: The jokers in the pack added a twist to the usual card game, making it more interesting.
